bug.author: pstieber
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => master and 3.4 branches This is a cmake issue so all OSs and compilers that use cmake are affected. <denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
When the Turing option was added to the CUDA builds, the Turing entry in the _generations list in cmake/OpenCVDetectCUDA.cmake was not added. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Attempt a cmake build with -D CUDA_GENERATION="Turing"
